caption: Valid! Very welcoming customer service. Food was very delicious will definitely return

Vegan Hood is incredible. I have been waiting to come all the way from Jamaica, Queens to finally try it out and I am truly impressed. The owner is an absolute Goddess/Queen. She will make you feel cared for, respected & like family. NOT just like a customer picking up food. I am so thankful to have vegan food made by people from poor & working class communities like mine. I am even more thankful to support this business! Soon we will never have to go all the way to the bougie/gentrified parts of Manhattan/Brooklyn to pay for overpriced bird food in the name of health when we can have VEGAN SOUL healthy food in our own neighborhoods. Support these people because we need them to thrive!!!

I’ve never written a google review, but I felt absolutely compelled to leave a five star review for Veganhood. The Shrimp Po Boy is probably the best vegan sandwich I’ve had. Absolutely unreal how delicious it was. The fries? Perfect. I had come up from Philly today, and anytime I do in the future I will be stopping back for more.

I went to VeganHood for the very first time last Friday and I was blown away by the food. I ordered by the vegan buffalo wings with mac & cheese and some collard greens. The food is so flavorful and mouth-watering that it might leave you feeling a little guilty. I actually thought I was eating meat there for a second. Denise, the owner is just wonderful and helpful. She told me that I'd love the food and I absolutely did. I'd recommend this place to anyone who'd like to have some flavorful food, vegan or not.

This review is late but I tried VeganHood on New Year’s Eve 2020. The food was amazing! The chef definitely poured love into those dishes . Just for full transparency I was a little underwhelmed by the Mac n cheese but that’s not to say it’s not good. Everything else I ordered however blew me away. On top of that I really appreciated the excellent customer service, a lot of people nowadays take that for granted, but they really care at VeganHood and it shows. I’ll definitely be checking them out again when I’m in the area. Keep up the excellent work!
I had the shrimp poboy and the sour sap limeade. Everything was fresh and tasted amazing 🤤

Had it for the first time and fell in love. Was everything they said it would be in the reviews. The customer service is really the best and you can tell they value their customers. My girl and I had the Flatbush which is their vegan oxtails. Tasted like everything oxtails should be!! The sautéed kale and the Mac and cheese were sooo good. Addicted!! Highly recommend!!!!
Amazing food!!  Great customer service!!  Today was my first time and I’ll be ordering as much as I can. ❤️❤️❤️❤️
the food is so incredible! a place every vegan should visit :)

10/10 the food is bomb. I have the fried shrimp mac n cheese n kale. The shrimp was crispy af and very tasty, very well seasoned.  Im shook because the mac n cheese is vegan but dead dont taste like it, it might even be better than dairy mac.  The sautéed kale is a much better alternative to collard greens. Seasoned in the same style as collard greens. Very tasty.

First and foremost the customer service is top notch! Highly highly recommend the Shrimp Po' Boy and the Mac and Cheese! The prawns were seasoned/breaded and fried to perfection. I was not a fan of coleslaw at all but this gave me a change of heart. Serving was definitely more than enough especially with the fries (this could be a meal for two depending on a person's hunger level). Serving Great that there's another Black owned/Woman owned vegan restaurant to support!
One of the best vegan mac and cheese I’ve ever had.
Best vegan fried chicken I’ve ever had 🎉

I have never even seen a Vegan Po Boy and I LOVED it! This place is wonderful. Cannot wait to go back and try everything! Also, the portions are very large, it took me a couple days to eat this sandwich.
This food is UNBELIEVABLE and the owner was so helpful and friendly. Cannot recommend them enough.

I am a long time vegetarian, and brought my friend who is a vegan of nearly 18 years. This place is BANANAS. I got the vegan oxtail (Flatbush), empeñada, and potato salad, plus the Soursop limeade. Oh. My GOODNESS. I couldn’t tell this was vegan, to a point where if I was given a bite I would spit it out for fear it was meat, it was that good.  Run, don’t walk, to this incredible place! Worth every cent I paid. I will be back!!
The food was delicious! It's a challenge finding good mac n cheese but this place makes it possible. The kale was bomb too!  I'm looking forward to ordering again.
Everything tastes great. Love this place! It’s addicting to say the least 😂

I cannot get enough of this food!!  The ladies are genuinely concerned with their customers and have taken a hands-on approach in my personal experience multiple times. The FOOD is GREAT and the CUSTOMER SERVICE is AMAZING.  I'm a loyal customer after just three orders in as many days! I will continue to support this awesome VEGAN option.
This is hands down the best vegan food I've tasted . The real deal for those that want the taste of meat without the soy subsitite . Ive ordered from this place daily its addictive like KFC
Some of the best vegan food I’ve had in the city!
